articles.title: Title of Tribal Chief Awarded to Kim Jong Il by Kingdom of Nigeria
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Lao Delegation 
   Pyongyang, September 17 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with the delegation of the National Sports Commission of Laos led by its President Phouthong Seng-Akhom in a friendly atmosphere at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Wednesday.
